name: Ultimate Free Word Search
description:
Ultimate Free Word Search, expand and improve your vocabulary by finding the hidden words in this word search! With ultimate free word search, you can choose from 20 unique word lists to find short, long and rare words.

This free word search game is perfect for individuals of all ages because it’s fun to play and educational. Some of the word lists that are available in this free game are adverbs, animals, astronomy, cooking, sports and even some random words!

Not like other word search games that use offensive words, this free word search game does not use offensive words. We’ve also included a free to use hint button in case you ever get stuck!

We hope you have fun!
